title: Jennifer Lopez approves of Lisa Rinna's 'awesome' JLo-inspired Versace Halloween costume
text:
CLOSE Jennifer Lopez won Milan Fashion Week, when she emerged on the Versace runway wearing a version of the jungle dress that nearly broke the internet almost 20 years ago. (Sept. 21) AP Entertainment

Lisa Rinna from the block?

"The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills" star unleashed her inner Jennifer Lopez for Halloween in the iconic Versace gown that JLo wore to the 2000 Grammys.

And Rinna got Lopez's stamp of approval.

"It was really, really cute. She looked awesome," Lopez told Access Hollywood, adding that fiancé Alex Rodriguez brought Rinna's getup to her attention on Instagram.

Lopez continued: "Actually, Alex sent that to me. He's like, 'look!'"

Rinna donned the green, jungle-print gown that (no kidding) led to the creation of Google Images for Casamigos’ annual Halloween bash on Friday in Beverly Hills.

Halloween 2019: Nicki Minaj becomes 'HalloQUEEN' as Harley Quinn; more great celeb costumes

Jennifer Lopez presents an award at the 42nd Annual Grammy Awards on Feb. 20, 2000. (Photo: ROBERT HANASHIRO, USA TODAY)

Rinna's transformation wasn't complete without an impromptu music video to Lopez's 2002 hit "Jenny From the Block," featuring stylish lip syncing and epic dance moves.

More: Lisa Rinna reveals she 'probably' has issues with food from being 'in this business'

Lopez's Versace look remains a pop culture phenomenon nearly two decades later, and she rightfully calls the viral look her "biggest fashion moment ever."

In September, the singer/actress revisited her iconic dress at Milan Fashion Week, hitting the Versace runway in a similar version of the infamous dress that managed to show more skin than the daring original.

More: Jennifer Lopez stuns on Milan Fashion Week runway in new version of iconic Versace dress

description: Lisa Rinna from the block? "The Real Housewives" star unleashed her inner Jennifer Lopez for Halloween in JLo's iconic Versace gown.
